import React, {Component} from 'react' import '../css/About.css'; import Header from './Header'; import Slider from './Slider'; import API from './API' //import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; export default class About extends Component { state={ city: undefined, line: undefined, neighborhood_name: undefined, rdc_web_url: undefined, postal_code:undefined, stateUS:undefined, baths:undefined, price:undefined, beds:undefined, building_size_size:undefined, thumbnail: undefined, virtual_tour: undefined, error: undefined } sellHouse = async(e) => { e.preventDefault(); const city = e.target.elements.city.value; const api_url = await fetch(`https://realtor.p.rapidapi.com/properties/v2/list-for-sale?sort=relevance&limit=50&city=${city}`, { "method": "GET", "headers": { "x-rapidapi-host": "realtor.p.rapidapi.com", "x-rapidapi-key": "f9871e9028mshc949b36dd6ede42p19eea8jsnfe9903109b31" } }) const properties = await api_url.json(); const data= properties; console.log(data); this.setState({ city: data.city, line: properties.line, rdc_web_url: properties.rdc_web_url, postal_code:properties.postal_code, stateUS:properties.state, baths:properties.baths, price:properties.price, beds:properties.beds, neighborhood_name:properties.neighborhood_name, thumbnail: properties.thumbnail, virtual_tour: properties.virtual_tour, error: "" }); data.properties.forEach(function(item){ let pElem = document.createElement('li'); //pElem.classList let recipe_result = document.createElement('ul') let elemItems = ` ${item.address.city}${item.address.line}${item.address.postal_code}${item.address.state}.,${item.baths},${item.beds},$${item.price}, ${item.building_size.size}, ${item.office.name}
\n , `; console.log(item.address.city) pElem.innerHTML = elemItems; recipe_result.appendChild(pElem); let element = document.getElementById('body'); }); } render() { return(

About Katerina

Dedicated real estate specialist. Successfully transfers her previous expereince in the homeimprovement business to highly personal approach to every client.

Known for her integrity, knowledge, commitment, honesty, she understands how to handle both emotional and logical sides of the transaction.

” I understand how stressfull could be the process of buying or selling your residence, so I am always there to support and to educate ” – Katerina.

Katerina is also a great resource of contractors, handymen, cleaning crews and moving companies, and creates long-lasting relationship with each client.

Testimonials

Maria E. Flynn

MANAGER AT COLDHAWK INC.

Katerina does an incredible amount of research, she comes prepared which makes your decision making so much easier. She supports you throughout the entire process an asset for first time buyers!

Dalmar Johnson

FOUNDER OF WEBFLEX INC.

Thanks so much for your patience and expertise with helping my family, find a home! You have been very professional and honest, when it’s come to listing our home as well. Thank you!

David S. Morris

CEO AT ENTAVO LLC

Great service!! Bought and sold for us with great deals on both sides. He had as much time for us as we needed and gave great advice. She’s very knowledgeable. Highly recommended!

{this.props.price}

) } }
